original_text: Babylon's people may build their city very high. They may make its walls very strong. But I will send an army to destroy it.’ That is what the Lord says. Babylon's people may build their city very high. They may make its walls very strong. But I will send an army to destroy it.’ That is what the Lord says. Babylon's people may build their city very high. They may make its walls very strong. But I will send an army to destroy it.’ That is what the Lord says. Babylon's people may build their city very high. They may make its walls very strong. But I will send an army to destroy it.’ That is what the Lord says. Babylon's people may build their city very high. They may make its walls very strong. But I will send an army to destroy it.’ That is what the Lord says. Babylon's people may build their city very high.
korean_text: 가령 바벨론이 하늘까지 솟아오른다 하자 높은 곳에 있는 피난처를 요새로 삼더라도 멸망시킬 자가 내게로부터 그들에게 임하리라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: Babylon's people may build their city very high
sentences.korean_translation: 바빌론 사람들이 그들의 도시를 매우 높게 지을지라도

sentences.original_text: They may make its walls very strong
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 성벽을 매우 강하게 만들지라도

sentences.original_text: But I will send an army to destroy it
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 나는 그것을 파괴하기 위해 군대를 보내리라

sentences.original_text: That is what the Lord says
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 주님께서 말씀하신 바이다
